USB Link
CoActionOS
Collaboration diagram for USB Link:

Detailed Description

This module provides the interface to CoActionOS Link as a USB device. The interface can be customized by adding new initialization values for link_dev_desc and link_string_desc in the devices.c file. Only the following values can be changed by the user:

  • USB VID
  • USB PID
  • Manufacturer String
  • Product String
  • Serial Number String

Changing any of the above values will require custom USB drivers to make software applications work with CoActionOS.
